about_the_game:
B] Gaming Introduction · Fake/B]
You are right, but "Mikos Wish" is a new open world adventure game independently developed by MW Arts. The game takes place in a fantasy world called "Tianxiang". Here, the person selected by God will be awarded the "hand of God" to guide the power of the witch. You will play a mysterious role named "Traveler". In a free travel, you will meet with your own personality and unique ability to defeat the strong enemies with them and get back the loose relatives -at the same time, gradually discover " The truth of the witch ".
XX's literacy is very poor. I can get 500 gold copper coins every day every day "Mikos Wish". The income of about 15,000 gold and copper coins per month, which is the income level of less than $ 0.0011 per month in real life. Also. 000001, although I am only 1x, but I have surpassed the level of most people (including you). This is the proud capital given to me "Mikos Wish". It is no exaggeration to say that "Mikos Wish" is the most magnificent and most ambitious work in MW Arts so far. Even after experiencing 8700 hours of hard fighting, there are many secrets that have not been discovered, the missing weapons and equipment, and spells and skills that have never been used. Although the combat experience in the game is not much different from what we have seen in a series of games before, various carefully designed enemies and BOSS battles in the game have raised the battle to a brand new level. Just like the Legend of Sye Oda a few years ago, "Mikos Wish" is also a less excellent work that can not promote the development of similar games :)


Introduction to the game · True

This is a "beautiful girl battle" game. In the game, your goal will be to defeat the beautiful girl who will defeat each level and unlock the corresponding rewards.

Game features

Having mature three -codae strategy gameplay, exquisite character CG rewards and micro -cultivation systems, can freely match skills and abilities.
detailed_description:
B] Gaming Introduction · Fake/B]
You are right, but "Mikos Wish" is a new open world adventure game independently developed by MW Arts. The game takes place in a fantasy world called "Tianxiang". Here, the person selected by God will be awarded the "hand of God" to guide the power of the witch. You will play a mysterious role named "Traveler". In a free travel, you will meet with your own personality and unique ability to defeat the strong enemies with them and get back the loose relatives -at the same time, gradually discover " The truth of the witch ".
XX's literacy is very poor. I can get 500 gold copper coins every day every day "Mikos Wish". The income of about 15,000 gold and copper coins per month, which is the income level of less than $ 0.0011 per month in real life. Also. 000001, although I am only 1x, but I have surpassed the level of most people (including you). This is the proud capital given to me "Mikos Wish". It is no exaggeration to say that "Mikos Wish" is the most magnificent and most ambitious work in MW Arts so far. Even after experiencing 8700 hours of hard fighting, there are many secrets that have not been discovered, the missing weapons and equipment, and spells and skills that have never been used. Although the combat experience in the game is not much different from what we have seen in a series of games before, various carefully designed enemies and BOSS battles in the game have raised the battle to a brand new level. Just like the Legend of Sye Oda a few years ago, "Mikos Wish" is also a less excellent work that can not promote the development of similar games :)

name: Mikos Wish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Novelty three consumer development, unique capsule system, and special CG transformation system, are you still heartbroken?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese
